name: Posito
slogan: We accelerate growth using behavioural science, a growth model and an algorithmic database

team.name: Alex Moorhouse
team.bioHtml: Growth Marketing Consultant (Founder) at Posito. MA Marketing, BSc Behavioural Sciences, 15+ Years' Experience. Author of The Seen Startup. 4500 Meetup Members.

jobs.title: Growth marketing intern
jobs.description:
We are looking for an intern to help raise support mission over a period of 1-3 months.

We are working in one of the most exciting businesses, in one of the most exciting industries, at a critical time. We can either kick-start a role within the industry or offer the chance to become one of our first employees.​

We are offering no money for helping us out. That’s the bad bit. The good bit is you can work when you want and wherever you want. You can fit it in with your own entrepreneurial pursuits or while your studying. We give you our time and mentorship for free. You now have a head-start on others in your position.

You have a chance to fast-track the process on our site. We are looking purely for talent and ambition. There is no degree course that covers what we work on.

All we want is a single paragraph explaining what makes you suitable. Of course, you can approach this in countless ways.

Visit https://posito.co.uk/join to submit it.
